abstract: Rikers Island Correction Dept Officer Nicole Bartley is arrested for having sexual relations with inmate and for possession of marijuana.

headline.print_headline: Rikers Officer Accused of Sex With Inmate
headline.main: Rikers Officer Is Accused of Having Sex With an Inmate

snippet: Officer Nicole Bartley, 30, who also faces drug charges, said she planned to bring marijuana in to the jail as a favor to the inmate, Dasmond Loveless.
lead_paragraph: Officer Nicole Bartley, 30, who also faces drug charges, said she planned to bring marijuana in to the jail as a favor to the inmate, Dasmond Loveless.
